noun.description: A fossil reptile of the suborder Pareiasauria; a pareiasaur.

adjective.description: Of, relating to, or resembling a pareiasaurian.

origin: Late 19th century; earliest use found in Philosophical Transactions of the Royal Society of London. From scientific Latin Pareiasauria + -an. With the noun compare earlier Pareiasaurus and slightly later pareiasaur.
